description: This Java class, PojoWrapper, represents a wrapper around a CustomVariable object in a code generation framework. It manages dependencies based on the variable's sub-fields, supports dependency resolution for enums, events, nested POJOs, and arrays, and provides accessors for variable details and dependencies.

classes.name: PojoWrapper
classes.description: A wrapper class for CustomVariable objects, managing dependencies and representations within a code generation context.

methods.name: PojoWrapper
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the wrapper with a CustomVariable and adds the POJO to the section mask.

methods.name: getVarName
methods.description: Returns the variable name of the POJO, same as the underlying CustomVariable's name.

methods.name: getVariable
methods.description: Returns the underlying BaseVariable object (the CustomVariable this wrapper represents).

methods.name: getDependencies
methods.description: Returns an iterator over the wrappers this POJO depends on.

methods.name: buildDependencies
methods.description: Builds dependencies by examining the variables within the CustomVariable.

methods.name: checkDependency
methods.description: Checks and adds dependencies based on variable types: enum, event, custom POJO, array, or map.

methods.name: addDependency
methods.description: Adds a dependency wrapper to this POJO's dependency list and updates language mask settings.
